name: Mohit Singh
content: Homepage of Mohit Singh Mohit Singh Home Publications Book Teaching Coca-Cola Foundation Professor, H. Milton Stewart School of Industrial and Systems Engineering, Georgia Institute of Technology. Background Associate Professor, H. Milton Stewart School of Industrial and Systems Engineering, 2017-2023. Researcher, Microsoft Research, Redmond. (Sep 2011-Dec 2016). Assistant Professor at McGill University. (Jan 2010-August 2012, on leave from Sep 2011-August 2012). Postdoc at Microsoft Research, New England PhD in Algorithms, Combinatorics and Optimization (ACO) at Tepper School of Business, Carnegie Mellon University Research Interests My research is in discrete optimization, approximation algorithms, convex optimization. My publications. Professional Activities Director, Algorithms and Randomness Center, July 2019- June 2023. Associate Editor: Mathematical Programming, Operations Research. Organized Bellairs Workshop on Approximation Algorithms, 2011. On Program Committees of SODA 2022, STOC 2021, ITCS 2019, STOC 2017, SODA 2016, RANDOM 2015, MFCS 2014, FOCS 2013, APPROX 2013 , TAMC 2013, SODA 2010, SIAM Conference on Discrete Mathematics 2010. Contact Email: mohit.singh@isye.gatech.edu
